page.title: 12Page 12 Playground Games 1
page.content: At school we play games like Football,Rounders,Tennis and Cricket. Another game we play is called British Bulldog. You play this game with 11 or more players. At first 1 player stands in a chalk circle and shouts,"Last one in the circle is It." All the others run to the other side of the playground and start shouting,"Who do you want?" The person who is It picks someone who has 10 seconds to cross the playground. If he gets to the other side without getting caught the others come across to join him. This goes on until the game has finished. In Hide and Seek one person hides and the other counts to a hundred. Then when he has finished counting he goes to find the person hiding.
